para1: BVA Youth Volleyball Camps offer an exciting and structured volleyball experience for young athletes during the March Break school holiday. Led by BVA-certified coaches, campers develop volleyball fundamentals in a fun, supportive, and high-energy environment.
para2: The camp runs for two consecutive weeks, allowing families to choose one or both sessions. Each day is packed with skill drills, games, and friendly competition designed to build confidence and love for the sport.

schedule.activity: Registration & Welcome — Sign in, meet coaches, warm-up stretches
Morning Skill Session — Serving, passing, and setting fundamentals
Skill Drills & Stations — Rotational stations focusing on different skills
Lunch Break — 60-minute break (campers bring own lunch)
Afternoon Skill Session — Spiking, blocking, and defensive techniques
Scrimmage Games — Friendly matches and team play
Cool Down & Review — Stretching, team debrief, and daily highlights
